channel.title: EDGAR Logs on Democratize Data For Insights
channel.description: Recent content in EDGAR Logs on Democratize Data For Insights

item.title: Tracing The Origins of EDGAR Downloads
item.description: 1. Introduction My research centers around how market participants act upon their perceived informational advantages over others. And because of this, I have always found it intriguing to leverage people’s digital traffic in accessing firms’ EDGAR filings to capture the dynamics of market participants’ information sets. During my explorations, I found IPinfo.io generously provided all the registered users with the bulk data for organization to which the IP address is registered.
